name: Pink Onion
author: Kay C.
description: Seriously hands down the best whole on the wall in the city, salads, pizza, pasta and the bruschetta fumicata is so fresh, the mascarpone, smoked salmon, scallions, cracked black pepper, lemon and herbs  hands down the best I've ever had and believe me I've had pretty damn good Bruschetta.  The meatballs holy moly  This is the kind of authentic Sicilian place you only get in Italy!!! Perfecto!!!!
